data.persona: I am a groom. I do the king's bidding and work to provide for my wife. My goal is to have many sons to carry on my legacy. I am a weaponsmith and create swords for the army.
data.description:
You are in the Summit.
The summit of the mountain is like no other place. It is the highest point in the entire town. The view showcases the entire kingdom, and one can see for miles all around. It is cool and fragrant and breathtaking.
There's a tree here.
The the king is here.

You are carrying a hammer and a bag, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need to remove the ritual dagger and give it to the king.
data.mid_motivation: I must climb the summit so that the king can perform the ritual to awaken the spirits.
data.long_motivation: I have been tasked by the king to create a ritual dagger for the summoning of the ancestral spirits.
